snippet: Gov. Lincoln Chafee, a Democrat, signed a bill with the increase his office said Thursday.
abstract: Rhode Island Gov Lincoln Chafee signs bill to increase state's minimum wage by $1, to $9 an hour, starting in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Lincoln Chafee, a Democrat, signed a bill with the increase his office said Thursday.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Minimum Wage Will Rise to $9 an Hour
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Minimum Wage Will Rise to $9 an Hour
